scripts.install: npm run install:host && npm run install:userList && npm run install:userDetail && npm run install:userFollowers
scripts.execute:userList: cd user-list && npm run build-styles && npm run dev && cd..
scripts.execute:userDetail: cd user-detail && npm run run:styles && npm run run:all && cd..
scripts.execute:userFollowers: cd user-followers && npm run run:styles && npm run run:all && cd..
scripts.execute:host: cd host && npm run run:all && cd..
